TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebOperationContext extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.IExtension`1<class System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>
Public Class WebOperationContext Implements IExtension(Of OperationContext)

summary.span: 提供簡易存取 Web 要求與回應之內容屬性的 Helper 類別。

span.span: A helper class that provides easy access to contextual properties of Web requests and responses.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何擷取與目前呼叫之 Web 作業內容相關聯的 執行個體。The following code shows how to retrieve the instance associated with the Web operation context of the current call. 此程式碼也會示範如何設定傳出回應的 HTTP 狀態。The code also shows how to set the HTTP status for the outgoing response. [!code-csharp[AdvancedWebProgramming#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/advancedwebprogramming/cs/service.cs#0)] [!code-vb[AdvancedWebProgramming#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/advancedwebprogramming/vb/service.vb#0)]
